items.title: Buffalo Cauliflower (VG)
items.text: Vegan tender cauliflower tossed in Buffalo sauce (hot sauce) served with ranch.

items.title: Nachos special (VG)
items.text: GLUTEN FREE BACKED TO PERFECTION! corn tortilla chips, three cheese blends, tomatoes, onions, peppers, olives, and jalapenos served with tomato salsa and sour cream.

items.title: Slap Shot Wings
items.text: Choose from lemon pepper, BBQ, ginger chili, hot, cajun, salt & pepper served ranch dip.

items.title: Chicken Kebabs
items.text: Minced chicken marinated in our special spices and baked in a charcoal oven to perfection.

items.title: Slap Shot Protein Bites
items.text: Boneless chicken or fish marinated in Himalayan spices and char grilled to perfection.

items.title: Chilli Chicken
items.text: Crispy tender chicken bites tossed in a delecious hot, sweet.

items.title: Classic Crispy Chicken Sandwich
items.text: Crispy chicken breast, lettuce, tomatoes, and ranch aioli

items.title: Penne Alfredo
items.text: Asigo parmesan creamy cheese sauce, garlic toast. (Add grilled chicken $6.00)

items.text: 8 oz Sirloin steak with fries and garlic butter.
